类 Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hangman

  • public class Hangman
extends java.lang.Object
    Hangman game, try to guess right the word by input 1 letter each times. You have a maximum of 6 time to guess the letters wrong. You win if you guess right all the letters in the word. More informations on the comments in playHangman() method.

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

        public Hangman()

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkGuess

        public boolean checkGuess()
        this is the method that checks that if the guessed letter is part of the word.

      • done

        public boolean done()
        this is a boolean method that checks if the game is finished or not. The game is done if the player guessed right all the letters or failed 6 times.

      • fail

        public void fail()
        this is the method after the guess was confirmed not being part of the word. It prints out the graphics.

      • getGuess

        public void getGuess()
        this displays the dialogue box and ask the player to enter the letter they wanted to guess.

      • humanGraphics

        public void humanGraphics()
        this is the method of graphics if the guess failed. Graphics change each time.

      • inGuessed

        public void inGuessed()
        this is the method that limits the players to only type in 1 single letter and only enter the same letter once

      • playHangman

        public void playHangman()
        This is the method that runs the whole hangman project. It runs the setup first, which cleans everything on display and ready to start a new game. If the game did not finish, it will run the JOptionPane to ask the player to enter a letter. If the guess is valid(that means it's a single letter, and only have been guessed once). Then the program checks the guessed letter, it goes to the success method if guessed right the letter, it goes to the fail method if not. Game will end after everything had been guessed or the player failed 6 times. Another dialogue box would pop up, click ok to restart the game.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        This is the setup of the program. Start with underscores with the length equals to the word. You failed 0 times.

      • success

        public void success()
        this is the method after the guess was confirmed to be part of the word. It prints out the letter with the underscores at the correct position.

      • wordbank

        public java.lang.String wordbank()
        This is the method that randomize the words on the screen. It also stores as a string of all the words in it.
